Mezuro: Understanding source code metrics

Metric collectors...

  • Are not easy to understand
  • Do not follow a standardization

Metric platforms...

  • Are not complete FOSS
  • Are not very configurable

What is Mezuro?

  • FOSS web-based platform that analyzes source code
  • Extensible architecture

Philosofies

  • Help developers and maintainers to understand and feel comfortable using source code metrics
  • Results are public, and can be used by the community

Why Mezuro?

  • 100% FOSS solution
  • Continuously generate reviews about a project
  • More control over metrics

example: New Metric Configuration

* Configuration clone is a way to quick start Mezuro usage

Mezuro Architecture

  • Composed of two tools:
    • Kalibro, that is segmented in Kalibro Processor, Kalibro Configurations, and Kalibro Client
    • Prezento, the presentation layer

Mezuro Architecture

Next Steps

  • Front-end enhancement
  • Improvement of processing elapsed time
  • Auto-detection of repository language
  • Migrate code management to Gitlab
